<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->
# File Node Formatting

Represents a special `__FILE__` literal
<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Works

Before:

```ruby
__FILE__
```

After:

```ruby
__FILE__
```

## Formats as an arg

Before:

```ruby
def readdir(path = __FILE__)
```

After:

```ruby
def readdir(path = __FILE__)
```
